00138         chanrec()
00139         {
00140                 strcpy(name,"");
00141                 strcpy(custom_modes,"");
00142                 strcpy(topic,"");
00143                 strcpy(setby,"");
00144                 strcpy(key,"");
00145                 created = topicset = limit = 0;
00146                 topiclock = noexternal = inviteonly = moderated = secret = c_private = false;
00147         }
